name: intoxicatingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that makes you feel excited and happy: According to the travel writer, Naples remains the most intoxicatingly beautiful big city on the Mediterranean. Briefly and intoxicatingly, they controlled the balance of power in the world's most powerful nation.
More examplesFewer examplesWhen she sings live, her voice is intoxicatingly forceful, even harsh.The berries are intoxicatingly fragrant when plumply ripe.These animals are intoxicatingly cute, their long tails wrapped around branches, their lean, narrow faces looking curious, eager, animated.
